description:
Ran’s got a new swimsuit, so she wants to show it off at the pool! But her day off could have severe consequences when the ’Bukuro Gals try to take over Shibuya. Aya’s after Rei and Yuuya’s after Ran in their fun day at the pool.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gals Rule the Pool! Too Cool! Junior Detectives!
プール♥ワクワク→チューボー刑事!
